definition: The term "Zellwand" refers to a structural component found in living organisms. It is commonly used to describe a protective layer surrounding cells, providing support and maintaining their shape. This term is frequently employed in the context of biology and microbiology to discuss the cellular anatomy and functions of various organisms.

examples.german: Die Zellwand ist eine feste Hülle um die Zelle.
examples.english: The cell wall is a rigid envelope around the cell.

examples.german: Die Zellwand schützt die Zelle vor äußeren Einflüssen.
examples.english: The cell wall protects the cell from external influences.

examples.german: Die Zellwand besteht hauptsächlich aus Zellulose.
examples.english: The cell wall is mainly composed of cellulose.

examples.german: Die Zellwand verleiht der Pflanzenzelle Stabilität.
examples.english: The cell wall provides stability to the plant cell.

examples.german: Die Zellwand ermöglicht den Austausch von Stoffen zwischen den Zellen.
examples.english: The cell wall allows the exchange of substances between cells.
